trans-unit.source: A class that enables you to associate easing functions with a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.QuaternionAnimationUsingKeyFrames"></xref> key frame animation.
trans-unit.target: Uma classe que permite-lhe associar easing funciona com um <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.QuaternionAnimationUsingKeyFrames"> </xref> chave animação da moldura.

trans-unit.source: For an example of using an object similar to this one, see <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingDoubleKeyFrame>.
trans-unit.target: Para obter um exemplo de utilização de um objeto semelhante a esta um, consulte <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingDoubleKeyFrame>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingDoubleKeyFrame>

trans-unit.source: This class is used as part of a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.QuaternionKeyFrameCollection> in conjunction with a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.QuaternionAnimationUsingKeyFrames> to animate a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Quaternion> property value along a set of key frames.
trans-unit.target: Esta classe é utilizada como parte de um <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.QuaternionKeyFrameCollection>em conjunto com um <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.QuaternionAnimationUsingKeyFrames>para animar uma <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Quaternion>valor da propriedade ao longo de um conjunto de chaves fotogramas.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Quaternion> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.QuaternionAnimationUsingKeyFrames> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.QuaternionKeyFrameCollection>

trans-unit.source: This <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.QuaternionKeyFrame> interpolates between the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Quaternion> value of the previous key frame and its own value linearly with an easing function to produce its output value.
trans-unit.target: Isto <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.QuaternionKeyFrame>interpolates entre o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Quaternion>valor a fotograma chave anterior e o seu próprio valor de forma linear com uma função easing para produzir o respetivo valor de saída.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Quaternion> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.QuaternionKeyFrame>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingQuaternionKeyFrame"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingQuaternionKeyFrame"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingQuaternionKeyFrame"></xref> class with the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Quaternion"></xref> value.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingQuaternionKeyFrame"> </xref> classe com especificado <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Quaternion"> </xref> valor.

trans-unit.source: The initial <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Quaternion"></xref> value.
trans-unit.target: Iniciais <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Quaternion"> </xref> valor.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingQuaternionKeyFrame"></xref> class with the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Quaternion"></xref> value and key time.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingQuaternionKeyFrame"> </xref> classe com especificado <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Quaternion"> </xref> valor e chave de tempo.

trans-unit.source: The initial <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Quaternion"></xref> value.
trans-unit.target: Iniciais <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Quaternion"> </xref> valor.

trans-unit.source: The initial key time.
trans-unit.target: O tempo chave inicial.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingQuaternionKeyFrame"></xref> class with the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Quaternion"></xref> value, key time, and easing function.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingQuaternionKeyFrame"> </xref> classe com especificado <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Quaternion"> </xref> valor, chave tempo e easing função.

trans-unit.source: The initial <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Quaternion"></xref> value.
trans-unit.target: Iniciais <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Quaternion"> </xref> valor.

trans-unit.source: The initial key time.
trans-unit.target: O tempo chave inicial.

trans-unit.source: The easing function.
trans-unit.target: A função easing.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Freezable"></xref> derived class.
trans-unit.target: Cria uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Freezable"> </xref> classe derivada.

trans-unit.source: When creating a derived class, you must override this method.
trans-unit.target: Ao criar uma classe derivada, tem de substituir este método.

trans-unit.source: Animation classes inherit indirectly from <xref:System.Windows.Freezable>.
trans-unit.target: Classes de animação herdarem indiretamente <xref:System.Windows.Freezable>.</xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: Because of this, you need to override the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BackEase.CreateInstanceCore%2A> method to construct a custom animation object.
trans-unit.target: Por este motivo, terá de substituir o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BackEase.CreateInstanceCore%2A>método para construir um objeto de animação personalizada.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BackEase.CreateInstanceCore%2A>

trans-unit.source: The new instance.
trans-unit.target: A nova instância.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the easing function applied to the key frame.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a função easing aplicada para a fotograma chave.

trans-unit.source: The easing function applied to the key frame.
trans-unit.target: A função easing aplicada para a fotograma chave.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingQuaternionKeyFrame.EasingFunction*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingQuaternionKeyFrame.EasingFunction*>propriedade de dependência.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingQuaternionKeyFrame.EasingFunction*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Interpolates, according to the easing function used, between the previous key frame value and the value of the current key frame, using the supplied progress increment.
trans-unit.target: Interpolates, de acordo com a função easing utilizada entre o valor de fotograma chave anterior e o valor da moldura chave atual, utilizando o incremento de progresso fornecido.

trans-unit.source: The value to animate from.
trans-unit.target: O valor para animar do.

trans-unit.source: A value between 0.0 and 1.0, inclusive, that specifies the percentage of time that has elapsed for this key frame.
trans-unit.target: Um valor entre 0,0 e 1,0, inclusive, que especifica a percentagem de tempo decorrido para este frame chave.

trans-unit.source: The output value of this key frame given the specified base value and progress.
trans-unit.target: O valor de saída deste fotograma chave indicado o valor base especificado e o progresso.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the animation will automatically flip the sign of the destination quaternion to ensure the shortest path is taken.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se a animação automaticamente será Inverte o sinal de quaternion o destino para garantir que o caminho mais curto é executado.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the animation will automatically flip the sign of the destination quaternion to ensure the shortest path is taken; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se a animação será automaticamente Inverte o sinal de quaternion o destino para garantir que o caminho mais curto é direcionado; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingQuaternionKeyFrame.UseShortestPath*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingQuaternionKeyFrame.UseShortestPath*>propriedade de dependência.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingQuaternionKeyFrame.UseShortestPath*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.
